TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit DataPagerField extends System.Object implements class System.Web.UI.IStateManager
Public MustInherit Class DataPagerField Implements IStateManager
public ref class DataPagerField abstract : System::Web::UI::IStateManager

summary.span: 作為資料頁面巡覽區欄位類型的基底類別，代表 控制項的導覽控制項。

span.span: Serves as the base class for data pager field types, which represent a navigation control for the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別可做為所有的資料頁面巡覽區欄位類型的基底類別。The class serves as the base class for all data pager field types. 資料頁面巡覽區欄位由表示巡覽控制項的控制項。Data pager fields are used by the control to represent a navigation control. 使用衍生自類別若要選擇哪種類型的頁面巡覽區顯示在控制項。Use the classes that are derived from to select which type of pager is displayed in the control. 下表列出可用的資料頁面巡覽區欄位類型。The following table lists available data pager field types. |頁面巡覽區欄位類型Pager field type|描述Description| |----------------------|-----------------| ||可讓使用者瀏覽一個頁面，一次，或是跳到第一個或最後一頁。Lets users navigate through data pages one page at a time, or to jump to the first or last page.| ||可讓使用者選取 頁面的頁碼。Lets users select a page by page number.| ||可讓網頁開發人員建立自訂的分頁 UI。Lets page developers create a custom paging UI.| 您可以從衍生類別來建立其他的頁面巡覽區欄位類型。You can derive from the class to create additional pager field types. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用， ，並以顯示頁面導覽控制項中的物件控制項。The following example shows how to use , , and objects to display page navigation controls in a control. 物件衍生自類別。The objects are derived from the class. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField/CS/DataPagerFieldCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField/VB/DataPagerFieldVB.aspx#1)]

span.para:
當您繼承自類別，您必須覆寫下列成員:-
-
- 。

When you inherit from the class, you must override the following members: -
-
- .

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 因為類別是抽象的您無法建立直接物件。Because the class is abstract, you cannot create a object directly. 在衍生類別初始化屬性中所定義的建構函式通常會呼叫這個建構函式類別。This constructor is typically called by the constructor of a derived class to initialize the properties that are defined in the class.

span.span: Creates a copy of the current object that is derived from .
A copy of the current object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法是協助程式方法，以供方法來建立一份目前的物件衍生自。The method is a helper method that is used by the method to create a copy of the current object that is derived from . 若要建立一份目前的物件，方法會先建立的新執行個體物件使用方法。To create a copy of the current object, the method first creates a new instance of a object by using the method. 然後它會呼叫方法來複製目前物件的屬性值。Then it calls the method to copy the property values of the current object.

summary.span: 建立 URL，這個 URL 包含含有所指定頁碼的查詢字串欄位。

span.span: Creates a URL that contains a query string field that has the specified page number.
The target URL.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法由和頁面巡覽區欄位建立頁面巡覽區欄位的每個按鈕的目標 URL。The method is used by the and pager fields to create the target URL for each button of the pager field. 目標 URL 包含查詢字串欄位，其中包含名稱/值組。The target URL includes a query string field that contains a name/value pair. 名稱為的值property 和 value 代表的值`pageNumber`。The name is the value of the property, and the value represents the value of `pageNumber`.

param.name: savedState

span.span: The saved view-state values for the control.

summary.span: 還原先前儲存的檢視狀態資訊。

span.span: Restores view-state information that was saved previously.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會還原檢視狀態資訊所儲存的物件期間的上一頁要求中的方法。The method restores view-state information for the object that was saved by the method during a previous page request. 這個方法主要是由[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]基礎結構，不適合直接從您的程式碼使用。This method is primarily used by the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code. 不過，控制項開發人員可以覆寫這個方法，以指定的自訂伺服器控制項如何還原其檢視狀態。However, control developers can override this method to specify how a custom server control restores its view state. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ASP.NET 狀態管理概觀](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce)。For more information, see [ASP.NET State Management Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce).

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void OnFieldChanged() cil managed
abstract member OnFieldChanged : unit -> unit override this.OnFieldChanged : unit -> unit

summary.span: 引發 事件。

span.span: Raises the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會引發事件，指出狀態的物件已變更。The method raises an event that indicates that the state of the object has changed. 若要變更屬性會導致引發此事件。Changes to the property cause this event to be raised. 在衍生類型中屬性的變更也會引發這個事件發生狀態變更時。Changes to properties in derived types also raise this event when state changes occur. 方法可讓衍生的類別，而不需要附加委派處理事件。The method enables derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

span.para: 當您覆寫衍生類別中呼叫基底類別的方法，讓已註冊的委派收到事件。
When you override in a derived class, call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

MemberSignature.Value: protected: property bool QueryStringHandled { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.QueryStringHandled : bool with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定值，這個值表示是否已評估查詢字串欄位。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the query string field has been evaluated.

value.span: 如果已評估查詢字串欄位則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the query string field has been evaluated; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 並頁面巡覽區欄位使用屬性來判斷是否已評估查詢字串欄位。The and pager fields use the property to determine whether the query string field has been evaluated. 如果是`false`，頁面巡覽區欄位類別處理查詢字串欄位中包含的頁碼。If is `false`, the pager field class processes the page number that is contained in the query string field. 它也會更新頁面屬性的控制項。It also updates the page properties of the control. 頁面巡覽區欄位類別會使用這個屬性時，才屬性不是空字串或`null`。The pager field class uses this property only when the property is not an empty string or `null`.

MemberSignature.Value: Protected ReadOnly Property QueryStringValue As String
protected: property System::String ^ QueryStringValue { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 從要求的 URL 取得查詢字串欄位的值。

span.span: Gets the value of the query string field from the URL of the request.
The value of the query string field.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當屬性不是空字串或`null`，則控制項會用來逐一導覽頁面的 HTTP GET 命令。When the property is not an empty string or `null`, the control uses the HTTP GET command to navigate through the pages. 名稱/值組所組成的查詢字串欄位加入至頁面的 URL。A query string field that consists of a name/value pair is added to the URL of the page. 屬性會擷取要求的 URL 中的查詢字串欄位的值。The property retrieves the value of the query string field from the URL of the request. 屬性包含要求的頁面數目。The property contains the requested page number. 這個屬性由和来評估的第一筆要求資料的頁面索引的頁面巡覽區欄位。This property is used by the and pager fields to evaluate the index of the first record for the page of data requested. 頁面屬性的再更新控制項。The page properties of the control are then updated.

summary.span: 讓 追蹤其檢視狀態變更，以將變更儲存在控制項的 物件中，並在相同頁面的其他要求之間保存。

span.span: Causes the object to track changes to its view state so that they can be stored in the control's property and persisted across requests for the same page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 介面方法會叫用方法。The interface method invokes the method. 這包含實際的實作，並由控制項開發人員可以擴充。This contains the actual implementation and can be extended by control developers.

summary.span: 讓 追蹤其檢視狀態變更，以將變更儲存在控制項的 物件中，並在相同頁面的其他要求之間保存。

span.span: Causes the object to track changes to its view state so that they can be stored in the control's property and persisted across requests for the same page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會在內部設定屬性設`true`，並叫用方法物件。The method internally sets the property to `true` and invokes the method for the object.

MemberSignature.Value: Protected ReadOnly Property ViewState As StateBag
protected: property System::Web::UI::StateBag ^ ViewState { System::Web::UI::StateBag ^ get(); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 取得狀態資訊的字典，可讓您在相同頁面的多個要求之間儲存和還原 物件的檢視狀態。

span.span: Gets a dictionary of state information that enables you to save and restore the view state of a object across multiple requests for the same page.

value.span: 包含 檢視狀態資訊的物件。

span.span: An object that contains the view-state information.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 資料頁面巡覽區欄位的檢視狀態是累積的所有屬性值。A data pager field's view state is the accumulation of all its property values. 要在相同網頁的 HTTP 要求之間保留值，ASP.NET 伺服器控制項使用這個屬性來儲存屬性值。To preserve values across HTTP requests for the same page, ASP.NET server controls use this property to store the property values. 值會儲存在 HTML 隱藏 input 元素，在頁面上。The values are stored in an HTML hidden input element on the page. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ASP.NET 檢視狀態概觀](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/19d2a6ed-9a77-4c7c-a7f5-74dd4b6c3818)。For more information, see [ASP.NET View State Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/19d2a6ed-9a77-4c7c-a7f5-74dd4b6c3818). 根據預設，所有的伺服器控制項，會啟用檢視狀態，但有些情況時您可能會想要停用它。By default, view state is enabled for all server controls, but there are circumstances when you might want to disable it. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ASP.NET 效能概觀](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f882bf1b-a009-4312-ac06-74370ffabc0b)。For more information, see [ASP.NET Performance Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f882bf1b-a009-4312-ac06-74370ffabc0b). 如需字典和使用方式的詳細資訊，請參閱[集合和資料結構](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/60cc581f-1db5-445b-ba04-a173396bf872)。For more information about dictionaries and how to use them, see [Collections and Data Structures](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/60cc581f-1db5-445b-ba04-a173396bf872).

if the is rendered; otherwise, .
The default value is .
